alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 3:18AM MST until February 22 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong gusty winds may continue for a time when heavy snow begins across the area after 2 AM Wednesday. A Winter Storm warning is in effect for this portion of the storm.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
